channel.title: Hello World. This is Spicer From Cloudmanic Labs
channel.description:
Howdy.
I am the Founder and CEO at [Cloudmanic Labs][1]. We are Portland Oregon based. That does not say much because our entire team is remote. We have been in business for 15 years. Like many we started out as a consulting agency and over time morphed into a product company. Today we build web and mobile apps with a strong focus around building software for the small business.
[1]: http://cloudmanic.com

item.title: Hello World. This is Spicer From Cloudmanic Labs
item.dc:creator: spicer
item.description:
hehe. yeah. Been around the block a bit. The good news is I started young so I am not that old.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello World. This is Spicer From Cloudmanic Labs

15 years! You shall henceforth be known as “the old man”.
